Here is the list of zodiac signs and their corresponding scores based on various astrological criteria:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural-born leaders, but can be impulsive.
2. Taurus - 8.5/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Versatile and communicative, but can be flighty.
4. Cancer - 8/10 - Nurturing and emotional, but can be overly sensitive.
5. Leo - 8.5/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can be prideful.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but can be perfectionistic.
7. Libra - 8.5/10 - Diplomatic and social, but can be indecisive.
8. Scorpio - 8/10 - Passionate and intense, but can be secretive.
9. Sagittarius - 9.5/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but can be blunt.
10. Capricorn - 8.5/10 - Ambitious and responsible, but can be strict.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but can be rebellious.
12. Pisces - 8/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, but can be dreamy.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general astrological characteristics associated with each sign.
